text: Gei tangada di langi o Dimaadua ga helekai gi Elijah, soukohp mai Tishbe, gii hana gi heetugi gi nia daangada kae hegau o di king Ahaziah gi heeu gi digaula, “Goodou e aha ala e halahala godou hagamodongoohia mai baahi o Belsebub, di god o Ekron? Goodou e hagamaanadu bolo ma deai di God i Israel ai?
